question:
Consider the following statements about the Financial Stability and Development Council (FSDC):
  1. The Finance Secretary is the chairperson of the council
  2. It monitors macro-prudential supervision of the economy
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because union finance minister is the chairperson of the council. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The members of FSDC include heads of financial sector regulators like RBI, SEBI, and PFRDA & IRDA. It has been entrusted with performing two functions- first is to strengthen financial stability and second is enhancing coordination among the financial regulators.
